description: Collaborative meetings & learning environments typically have multiple presenters needing to display content from a desktop, laptop, or tablet computing device. Unplugging and passing the VGA cable takes valuable time away from meeting or lesson. Belkin's 4-Port Video Switch allows you to connect up to 4 computing devices to a video display simultaneously and seamlessly switch between the computing devices. The 4-Port Video Switch is plug-and-play, so anyone with a VGA output can display and present.
title: Belkin 4-Port Video Display Switch
